business.headline: Stocks to watch on April 22: HUL, HCLTech, Coal India, Paytm, Mazagaon DockShares of HCLTech, Waaree Energies, and Tata Communications will be in focus as they are set to announce their quarterly results today.

Dow Jones tumbles nearly 1,000 points as US stock markets crashTrump on Monday repeated his criticism of Fed Chair Jerome Powell and said the US economy could slow down unless interest rates are lowered immediately.

Former Fortis promoter Shivinder Singh files personal insolvency: ReportSingh has invoked Section 94 of the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code (IBC), which allows individuals to file for insolvency if they are unable to repay debts. In his plea, Singh stated that his liabilities now exceed the value of his remaining assets.
Sensex, Nifty rise over 1% in fifth-day rally led by banking, IT gainsThe S&P BSE Sensex added 855.30 points to close at 79,408.50, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 273.90 points to end at 24,125.55.

Klaus Schwab steps down as World Economic Forum chairThe WEF thanked Schwab for his 55 years of dedicated leadership and for building what has become a premier global platform for dialogue and progress.

India hopes to seal US trade pact this year: Finance Minister Nirmala SitharamanNirmala Sitharaman is on a five-day trip to the United States, where she will attend the spring meetings of the International Monetary Fund and the World Bank, and the meeting of G20 finance ministers and central bank governors.

HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank hit record highs after strong Q4: Buy, hold or sell?HDFC Bank rose 1.3% while ICICI Bank gained 0.9% by 9:40 am. Their gains helped lift the Nifty Bank and Nifty Private Bank indices by nearly 2%, and pushed the Nifty 50 up 0.6%, with heavyweight HDFC Bank emerging as the index's top driver.

Sensex soars 1,000 points: Why is stock market rising today?Stock market today: The rally on Monday marks the fifth straight session of gains, showing that investor confidence is returning. Both Sensex and Nifty touched their highest levels since January 6.

Explained: Why Yes Bank share price rose nearly 7% todayThe Yes Bank stock was trading at Rs 18.95 on the BSE, marking a 4.75% jump. Gains continued through the morning, with the stock touching an intraday high of Rs 19.37, indicating that it rallied nearly 7%.

Stock market rally: Should investors consider small-cap, mid-cap stocks?With strong institutional inflows and improved breadth in the market, analysts say the coming weeks could favour investors who are selectively increasing exposure to quality names in the midcap and smallcap universe.

Gold price nears Rs 1 lakh-mark amid global uncertainty. Should you buy or sell?Gold price today: Monday's jump follows a dip in the previous session, where MCX Gold fell 0.44% to Rs 95,239 due to profit booking. But the broader narrative remains dominated by geopolitical and macroeconomic anxiety.

'Era of salaryman is over': Saurabh Mukherjea warns India's middle classSpeaking on a recent podcast titled Beyond the Paycheck: India's Entrepreneurial Rebirth, Saurabh Mukherjea issued a clear and unsettling warning: salaried employment, long considered the golden path to financial security, is dying.

entertainment.headline: Kesari 2 box office Day 4: Akshay Kumar's film stays steady on first MondayAkshay Kumar's 'Kesari Chapter 2,' co-starring R Madhavan and Ananya Panday, released on April 18 and opened with around Rs 7.75 crore. In just four days of its release, the film has earned Rs 34 crore.

Rajinikanth delights fans, waves at them from moving car at Jailer 2 shoot. WatchSuperstar Rajinikanth is presently shooting for director Nelson Dilipkumar's 'Jailer 2' in Kerala. He made his fans happy as he greeted them with a big smile on his face on the film's shooting spot.

George Clooney calls himself 'luckiest' in 10-year fight-free marriage with AmalHollywood actor George Clooney revealed that he and his wife, Amal, never fought in their 10-year-long marriage. He further spoke about how their close friends and family are shocked to learn about how they have never argued in their relationship.

'Andor' Season 2: The most grounded chapter in Star Wars history is backAndor Season 2 premieres on Disney+, offering a grounded, emotional take on the Star Wars universe. With strong writing and rich characters, it explores rebellion through everyday heroes, not Jedi legends.

New Oscar rules require voters to watch every nominee, support refugee filmmakersThe Academy now requires Oscar voters to watch all nominated films in a category. New rules support refugee filmmakers, clarify AI use, and introduce future awards for casting and stunt design

Bhabiji... actor Shubhangi Atre's ex-husband Piyush Poorey dies in IndoreShubhangi Atre's former husband, Piyush Poorey, passed away after battling liver cirrhosis in Indore. The actor was not on talking terms with her husband after their divorce earlier this year.

Rapper Hanumankind shares glimpse of debut Coachella performance. WatchRapper Hanumankind made his US debut at Coachella 2025 and shared his journey to the festival on Instagram, showcasing his experiences from rehearsals to the stage.

Who Is Dylan Meyer? All About Kristen Stewart's WifeFrom secret scripts to shared vows, Kristen Stewart and Dylan Meyer's Hollywood love story turns a new page with an intimate LA wedding, blending romance, creativity, and quiet celebration.

Justin Bieber's Coachella 2025 videos make fans worried about singer's healthJustin Bieber's recent Coachella 2025 appearance has sparked concern among fans due to videos showing him disoriented and erratic, raising questions about his health and well-being.

Vicky Kaushal's Chhaava crosses Rs 600 crore-mark on Day 66 despite OTT releaseVicky Kaushal's film 'Chhaava' continues to dominate the box office even after its Netflix release, crossing Rs 600 crore in just 66 days. It is the third Hindi film to reach the milestone.

BLACKPINK Jennie gets emotional during Coachella, says 'Mom, I Love You'BLACKPINK member Jennie gave an electric solo performance at Coachella 2025. She had an emotional moment mid-performance and said "Mom, I love you" in Korean.

K-pop group SEVENTEEN announces album Happy Burstday ahead of 10 year anniversaryK-pop sensation SEVENTEEN has unveiled their fifth album 'Happy Burstday', set to release on May 26. The group also announced an upcoming tour and additional content.

Sinners hits $61 million worldwide in opening weekend, matches to Minecraft MovieWarner Bros 'Sinners', starring Michael B Jordan and Hailee Steinfeld, debuted to $61 million globally, aligning with overseas expectations. Meanwhile, 'A Minecraft Movie' continues its robust box office run, nearing $721 million worldwide.

Sparsh Shrivastava admits to being stereotyped: But I have different perspectiveActor Sparsh Shrivastava discusses dealing with stereotyping in the film industry. He also expressed that the labels should be removed, citing example of how veteran actors used to do specific roles multiple times.

Rajkummar Rao set to replace Aamir Khan in Ujjwal Nikam biopic: ReportActor Rajkummar Rao is in talks to play prosecutor Ujjwal Nikam in an upcoming biopic. Aamir Khan, who was originally playing the part, has stepped down and will now produce the film alongside Dinesh Vijan.

Babil Khan on seeking his mother's validation: Baba did the same with his motherBabil Khan, son of the late actor Irrfan, continues to seek his mother Sutapa's validation in all aspects of his life, much like his father did. Currently, he is celebrating the success of his latest film Logout, which recently premiered on Zee5 .

Jr NTR to begin shooting for Prashanth Neel's film on April 22 in KarnatakaThe makers have released a picture featuring Jr NTR and Prashanth Neel ahead of the new shoot schedule, where NTR is set to join the team on April 22.

Allu Arjun's look test for Atlee's film kickstarts in Mumbai: ReportAllu Arjun and director Atlee are currently in Mumbai prepping for their upcoming film, 'AA 22'. Reportedly, they are working on the look test and concept shoot.

Jonathan Pryce to Robbie Coltrane: Hollywood actors who played Pope on screenPope Francis died on April 21, weeks after battling double pneumonia. With the death of the 88-year-old spiritual head, take a look at all the Hollywood stars who played the Pope on-screen.

general news.headline: Harvard sues Trump administration over $2.2 billion funding freezeHarvard University is suing the Trump administration to block a $2.2 billion federal grant freeze, calling it retaliation for refusing demands to curb campus activism and implement political reforms.

PM hosts JD Vance in Delhi, leaders welcome significant progress in trade dealPrime Minister Narendra Modi met US Vice President JD Vance and his family at his official residence in Delhi. Both leaders discussed issues of mutual interest and welcomed the "significant progress" in the first phase of the bilateral trade deal.

Pope Francis died of stroke, irreversible heart failure: Vatican doctorPope Francis died early Monday after suffering a stroke and heart failure, according to a death certificate released by Vatican doctor Andrea Arcangeli. The document noted he fell into a coma before passing.

'Disgruntled employees': Trump defends Pentagon chief amid military leaks rowTrump and the White House defended Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth after reports he shared sensitive military info via Signal. Officials blamed disgruntled staff, denying any classified data was compromised.

Watch: PM Modi spends time with JD Vance's children, gifts them peacock feathersPrime Minister Narendra Modi on Monday gifted peacock feathers to US Vice President JD Vance's children — Ewan, Vivek, and Mirabel — as part of a warm and personalised welcome at his residence, 7 Lok Kalyan Marg.

The gesture came during a light-hearted interaction where the Prime Minister was seen showing the Vance family around. A video from the visit shows the Prime Minister playfully engaging with Ewan and Vivek, who were seen sitting on his lap and chatting with him.

The Vance family — JD, Usha, and their three children — are in India on an official four-day visit. On Tuesday, they will visit Jaipur, followed by a trip to the iconic Taj Maha on Wednesday.

'We are open to peace': Putin's first call for Ukraine talks in yearsRussian President Vladimir Putin proposed bilateral peace talks with Ukraine, expressed openness to ceasefires, and emphasized dialogue

Bhogle, Doull kept away from KKR vs GT after curator controversyPopular commentators Harsha Bhogle and Simon Doull were absent from KKR's home game against Gujarat Titans on Monday, April 21. Bhogle and Doull were involved in a controversy with Eden curator Sujan Mukherjee at the start of the season.

ED summons actor Mahesh Babu for questioning on April 27 in money laundering caseActor Mahesh Babu has been summoned by the ED for questioning on April 27 in a money laundering probe. The investigation is linked to Hyderabad-based real estate firms accused of fraudulent land deals and unaccounted cash transactions.

Watch: Delta plane catches fire at Orlando airport, passengers evacuate on slidesPassengers on a Delta flight evacuated using emergency slides after an engine caught fire at Orlando airport. No injuries were reported. The FAA is investigating the cause, and Delta arranged another plane to take passengers to their destination.

Bhaiya sorry: Man pleads as bodybuilders thrash him, smash his superbikeThe incident occurred on Sunday when the bike riders had left Gurugram's Ambience Mall for Panchgaon to eat paranthas. A road rage incident reportedly occurred on the Dwarka Expressway, during which the bodybuilders came face to face with a biker and assaulted him.

KKR vs GT: Kolkata need to rethink overrated tactics to mount IPL 2025 comebackIPL 2025, KKR vs GT: Anil Kumble and Mark Boucher were critical of Kolkata's tactic of tinkering with their batting lineup after the 39-run defeat to the Gujarat Titans at the Eden Gardens in Kolkata.

Trump's approval hits new low as Americans feel he abuses authority: PollUS President Donald Trump's approval rating has dipped to 42%, its lowest since his return to office, a Reuters/Ipsos poll shows. Many Americans are uneasy with his use of power, fearing he's overreaching in key areas like universities and culture.

Nashik water crisis: Planning, execution or funds — what's holding back relief?In Borichibari village of Nashik's Peth taluka, water isn't just scarce, it's a daily battle. As wells run dry, women risk health and safety trekking miles for every bucket. This ground report from Borichibari uncovers the toll water scarcity takes on lives, livelihoods, and futures.

'You'll be killed like your father': Baba Siddique's son gets death threatZeeshan Siddique, son of former state minister Baba Siddique, who was shot last year, received a death threat through his email. Zeeshan has received several such death threats ever since his father's murder.

Columbia activist's wife gives birth, says husband denied release to be presentNoor Abdalla gave birth to her son in New York while her husband, Mahmoud Khalil, remained in ICE detention in Louisiana. Despite requests, he was denied permission to attend. Abdalla stated she will continue to advocate for his release and their family's reunion.

Was very ill: JD Vance recalls last meeting with Pope before India visitPope Francis made his final public appearance on Easter Sunday, greeting thousands in St. Peter's Square and briefly meeting US Vice President JD Vance. Despite a recent illness, he delivered his Easter blessing before passing away.

George Clooney calls himself 'luckiest' in 10-year fight-free marriage with AmalHollywood actor George Clooney revealed that he and his wife, Amal, never fought in their 10-year-long marriage. He further spoke about how their close friends and family are shocked to learn about how they have never argued in their relationship.

Muslim employer helps Hindu couple marry in riot-hit MurshidabadMurshidabad's Domkal town saw a display of communal harmony when Muslim brick kiln owners and the community helped fund the marriage of a Hindu couple who worked for them.

Getting married soon? Gill's awkward reaction to Danny Morrison's questionIPL 2025, KKR vs GT: Shubman Gill became awkward after being asked about a personal question from Danny Morrison before the clash on Monday, April 21 at the Eden Gardens in Kolkata.

Twist in Bengaluru road rage? CCTV shows Air Force officer assaulting manCCTV footage of a road rage incident in Bengaluru shows IAF officer's alleged attack. The officer had posted a video on social media showing his bloodied face, saying he was attacked by a local resident, while his wife was abused.

Tiger first or human traditions? Why a boy met death in RanthamboreKnown for its majestic tigers, Ranthambore now cries for visionary rescue from the ever-expanding human footprint in the name of religion and safari and wedding tourism

Delhi man signs up as Blinkit delivery agent, says untouchability isn't just caste-basedA Delhi-based man swapped his desk job for a day to work as a Blinkit delivery agent, and came back with a reality check most people choose to overlook.

Bhabiji... actor Shubhangi Atre's ex-husband Piyush Poorey dies in IndoreShubhangi Atre's former husband, Piyush Poorey, passed away after battling liver cirrhosis in Indore. The actor was not on talking terms with her husband after their divorce earlier this year.

Mondo Duplantis 2nd track and field star after Usain Bolt to win Laureus top honourPole Vault star Mondo Duplantis became the second track and field athlete after Usain Bolt to win the Laureus Sportsman Of The Year award on Monday, April 21. Apart from Duplantis, Simone Biles and Lamine Yamal were also honoured.

sports.headline: KKR vs GT: Kolkata need to rethink overrated tactics to mount IPL 2025 comebackIPL 2025, KKR vs GT: Anil Kumble and Mark Boucher were critical of Kolkata's tactic of tinkering with their batting lineup after the 39-run defeat to the Gujarat Titans at the Eden Gardens in Kolkata.

Shubman, Sai and Buttler made pitch look easy during their batting: Sai KishoreGujarat Titans (GT) spinner Sai Kishore credited captain Shubman Gill, Sai Sudharsan and Jos Buttler for making the pitch look easy during their batting against Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR). GT beat KKR by 39 runs at Eden Gardens.

Rashid Khan's return to form has lifted the morale of Gujarat Titans: Sai KishoreIPL 2025, KKR vs GT: In the post-match press conference, Sai Kishore praised Rashid Khan after the Afghan leg-spinner returned to form with figures of 4-0-25-2 against the Kolkata Knight Riders.

Is leg-spin Andre Russell's kryptonite in IPL? KKR mentor Dwayne Bravo respondsKKR mentor Dwayne Bravo doesn't feel that leg-spin is Andre Russell's weakness in the IPL after their loss to GT. Russell was dismissed by Rashid Khan during the game at the Eden Gardens.

Mondo Duplantis 2nd track and field star after Usain Bolt to win Laureus top honourPole Vault star Mondo Duplantis became the second track and field athlete after Usain Bolt to win the Laureus Sportsman Of The Year award on Monday, April 21. Apart from Duplantis, Simone Biles and Lamine Yamal were also honoured.

KKR captain Rahane blames Narine, Gurbaz after meek surrender vs GujaratKolkata Knight Riders captain Ajinkya Rahane blamed openers Rahmanullah Gurbaz and Sunil Narine for the team's loss against Gujarat Titans at the Eden Gardens. Rahane asked his players to be brave from the next game.

14 runs off 19 balls in 199 chase: KKR fans slam Venkatesh IyerVenkatesh Iyer caught the ire of Kolkata Knight Riders' fans after a horror show with the bat against Gujarat Titans at the Eden Gardens. Iyer scored 14 off 19 balls in 199 chase.

Clinical Gujarat hammer hapless Kolkata to tighten grip on top spotIPL 2025, KKR vs GT: Shubman Gill's Gujarat Titans beat Ajinkya Rahane's Kolkata Knight Riders by 39 runs at the Eden Gardens to secure their sixth win of the competition and strengthened their grip on the top of the points table.

Bhogle, Doull kept away from KKR vs GT after curator controversyPopular commentators Harsha Bhogle and Simon Doull were absent from KKR's home game against Gujarat Titans on Monday, April 21. Bhogle and Doull were involved in a controversy with Eden curator Sujan Mukherjee at the start of the season.

Unlucky 90s: Shubman Gill matches Virat Kohli in wanted IPL recordGujarat Titans captain Shubman Gill got dismissed on 90 while playing against Kolkata on Monday, April 21. This was the second time that Gill was dismissed in his 90s.

Consider myself as an all-rounder for DC: Vipraj Nigam on his role in DelhiVipraj Nigam has said that he sees himself as an all-rounder for Delhi Capitals this season and wants to contribute with bat and ball for the team. Vipraj has been a star for DC this season, especially with the ball.

14 runs off 19 balls in 199 chase: KKR fans slam Venkatesh IyerVenkatesh Iyer caught the ire of Kolkata Knight Riders' fans after a horror show with the bat against Gujarat Titans at the Eden Gardens. Iyer scored 14 off 19 balls in 199 chase.

Clinical Gujarat hammer hapless Kolkata to tighten grip on top spotIPL 2025, KKR vs GT: Shubman Gill's Gujarat Titans beat Ajinkya Rahane's Kolkata Knight Riders by 39 runs at the Eden Gardens to secure their sixth win of the competition and strengthened their grip on the top of the points table.

Bhogle, Doull kept away from KKR vs GT after curator controversyPopular commentators Harsha Bhogle and Simon Doull were absent from KKR's home game against Gujarat Titans on Monday, April 21. Bhogle and Doull were involved in a controversy with Eden curator Sujan Mukherjee at the start of the season.

Unlucky 90s: Shubman Gill matches Virat Kohli in wanted IPL recordGujarat Titans captain Shubman Gill got dismissed on 90 while playing against Kolkata on Monday, April 21. This was the second time that Gill was dismissed in his 90s.

Consider myself as an all-rounder for DC: Vipraj Nigam on his role in DelhiVipraj Nigam has said that he sees himself as an all-rounder for Delhi Capitals this season and wants to contribute with bat and ball for the team. Vipraj has been a star for DC this season, especially with the ball.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
